title: Confronting Dark Forces with Deborah King
cleaned_text:
We are caught betwixt an ever raging battle between good and evil. From a higher perspective, both are emanations of the same light striving to return to the same source. Until we can attain this level of understanding, we need to learn how to protect ourselves from harm. Deborah King has been called to help us conquer dark forces in order to join with the light and advance on our path of spiritual growth in this interview with George Noory.

Modern day Shaman and High-Priestess of the Light, Deborah King, was a successful attorney in her twenties when she was diagnosed with cancer. Her amazing remission, at the hands of a medicine man, led her to leave the corporate arena for the mysterious world of entities and ETs, devils and demons, where she mastered ancient and modern systems. Her newest book, Entangled in Darkness, is a startling trip into an underworld of dark forces.
